---
title: TEMPLATE Environment Profile
summary: Template to document an environment (prod/staging/dev/customer)
tags:
  - template
  - environment
---

# Environment name

## Overview
Purpose, users, criticality

## Topology/Services
Map of key services

## Access
VPN/Bastion, IAM, rules

## Deploy
Strategy and frequency

## Observability
Dashboards, alerts, logs

## Differences vs other environments
Compatibility and limitations
